kannada_original: ಅತಿ ಸಹಜ ಆತಂಕ ನೂರು ತೊಂದರೆ ಜಗದಿ ;
english_transliteration: ati sahaja ātaṃka nūru toṃdare jagadi;
english_translation: Anxiety is very natural, a hundred troubles in the world;
But do not pine away, withered by agitation,

kannada_original: ಜೀವ ತೆತ್ತರೆ ಸೋತು, ನಾಳೆ ಇರುವುದೆ ಸೊಬಗು ?
english_transliteration: jīva tettare sōtu, nāḷe iruvude sobagu?
english_translation: If you lose and surrender your life, will beauty remain tomorrow?
Boldness is the companion! - Muddu Rāma. 589
